title: VDC Deployment
description: Elements needed to build a VDC

title: Cloud Design
description: Design sessions are meant to capture the key design decisions and requirements across the primary VDC disciplines.  These decisions will guide the VDC deployment.

title: Cloud Design Session  Identity Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Identity

title: Identity Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Identity

title: Identity Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Identity strategy

title: Identity Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Identity strategy document

title: Cloud Design Session  Operational Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Operations

title: Operational Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Operations

title: Operational Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Operations strategy

title: Operational Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Operations strategy document

title: Cloud Design Session  Organizational Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on the Organization

title: Organizational Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Organizational layout

title: Organizational Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Organizational strategy

title: Organizational Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Organizational strategy document

title: Cloud Design Session  Workload Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Workloads

title: Workload Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Workloads

title: Workload Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Workload strategy

title: Workload Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized Workload strategy document

title: Cloud Design Session  Network Discovery
description: Intitial design session focused on Network

title: Network Design Strategy Update
description: Updates made to strategy documenation, focus on Network

title: Network Design Strategy Review
description: Review with Customer updated Network strategy

title: Network Design Strategy Finalization
description: Finalized network strategy document

title: VDC Handoff
description: Ensure best practices are being followed for Identity and sync activities to onprem

title: Transition Support to 10M Manged Services
description: Formal handoff to Managed Services for continued support activity

title: Review Deliverables with Customer
description: Review sesssion with the customer

title: Code handoff to Customer
description: Provide code repo to customer

title: Azure Governance  Cloud Admin
description: Cloud Admin resources are centralized resources that are leveraged by shared services and across subscriptions

title: Deploy and Configure Cloud Admin Keyvault
description: Create centralized keyvaults (in each region) per 10M best practices

title: Deploy and Configure Central Cloud Admin storage account
description: Createc centralized storage accounts per 10M best practices

title: Azure Governance  Subscription Alignment
description: Ensure that all subscriptions within the Azure deployment are following 10M best practices and are aligned

title: Create and Deploy Subscriptions
description: Based on the design sessions, follow the subscription layout created.

title: Resource provider registration
description: Enable appropriate resource providers per subscription

title: Configure Activity Log
description: Enable and configure activity log per subscription following 10M best practices

title: Create Activity Log profile
description: Create Activity log profile per subscription following 10M best practices

title: Validate subscription RBAC
description: Validate users in the toplevel subscription roles.  Enable inheritance

title: Azure Governance  Security Center
description: Based on design sessions and security/compliance requirements, configure Security Center order to meet organizational needs

title: Deploy and Configure Security Center
description: Enable Security Center

title: Azure Governance  Policy
description: Based on design sessions and security/compliance requirements, configure Azure policy in order to meet organizational needs

title: Deploy and Configure Azure Policy Center (base policies)
description: Configure Azure Policy Center
